main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Salt Lake City, Utah on 7-8-59. The object was described as a round, bright light that hovered for 3-5 minutes before rapidly moving out of sight, displaying maneuvers unlike any known aircraft.
interesting points: The UFO was described as a half-moon shape, three times the size of the moon, and had a mass of flickering lights similar to the windows of an airliner.
It was observed to make two turns at a medium rate and then move four times faster than jets in the area.
The observer, a radio repairman, and a lieutenant from the Air Force both confirmed that the object displayed controlled logical maneuvers and was unlike any known bird or natural phenomenon.
The weather at the time of the sighting was clear with winds at various altitudes, and there were jets and local aircraft flying in all directions and altitudes in the area.
Neither the FAA nor the Salt Lake Control Tower had any information on the observed object, and there were no balloons in the area.
witnesses: radio repairman, 1st Lieutenant from the Air Force
